 Generate stars for nsky star fields from star catalog.

 Sort the stars with J band magnitude from brightest to dimmest.

Detailed Description

Generate random stars from besancon star counting model.

The data file contains J and H magnitudes of all stars within 5 square degree FoV. The location of the stars are assumed to be randomly distributed. Therefore, the possible number of stars within any sub-field is a poisson distribution with mean equal to the average density multiplied with area.

Function Documentation

Generate stars for nsky star fields from star catalog.

Returns:
a cell array of nskyx1, each cell contains (2+nwvl) x nstar array of location, and magnitudes.
Parameters:
nsky number of star fields wanted
lat galactic latitude.
lon galactic longitude
catscl Scale the catlog star count.
fov diameter of the patrol field of view in arcsec.
nwvl number of wavelength
wvls wavelength vector
rstat random stream 
00050  {
00051     char temp[80];
00052     double cat_fov;//catalogue fov
00053     if(nwvl==2 && fabs(wvls[0]-1.25e-6)<1.e-10 && fabs(wvls[1]-1.65e-6)<1.e-10){
00054     snprintf(temp,80,"besancon/JH_5sqdeg_lat%g_lon%g_besancon.bin.gz", lat, lon);
00055     cat_fov=5.0;//5 arc-degree squared.
00056     }else{
00057     error("We only have stars for J+H band. Please fill this part\n");
00058     }
00059     char *fn=find_file(temp);
00060     info("Loading star catalogue from \n%s\n",fn);
00061     dmat *catalog=dread("%s",fn); free(fn);
00062     if(catalog->ny!=nwvl){
00063     error("Catalogue and wanted doesn't match\n");
00064     }
00065     long ntot=catalog->nx;
00066     double navg=M_PI*pow(fov/2./3600.,2)/cat_fov * ntot * catscl;
00067     info("Average number of stars: %g, after scaled by %g\n", navg, catscl);
00068     dcell *res=dcellnew(nsky,1);
00069     PDMAT(catalog, pcatalog);
00070     double fov22=pow(fov/2/206265,2);
00071     for(long isky=0; isky<nsky; isky++){
00072     long nstar=randp(rstat, navg);
00073     if(nstar>0){
00074         res->p[isky]=dnew(nwvl+2, nstar);
00075         PDMAT(res->p[isky],pres);
00076         for(long istar=0; istar<nstar; istar++){
00077         long ind=round(ntot*randu(rstat));//randomly draw a star index in the catlog
00078         for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00079             pres[istar][2+iwvl]=pcatalog[iwvl][ind];
00080         }
00081         //randomly draw the star location.
00082         double r=sqrt(fov22*randu(rstat));
00083         double th=2*M_PI*randu(rstat);
00084         pres[istar][0]=r*cos(th);
00085         pres[istar][1]=r*sin(th);
00086         }
00087         //sort the stars from brigtest to dimmest
00088         qsort(res->p[isky]->p, res->p[isky]->ny, res->p[isky]->nx*sizeof(double), 
00089           (int(*)(const void*, const void*))sortfun);
00090     }else{
00091         res->p[isky]=NULL;
00092     }
00093     }
00094     dfree(catalog);
00095     return res;
00096 }
